channel.title: Marine Modeling and Analysis Branch (MMAB) : Current Conditions
channel.description: Current analysis and nowcast graphics for ocean conditions

item.title: Marine Modeling and Analysis Branch (MMAB) Current Conditions
item.description: Current analysis and nowcast graphics for ocean conditions

item.title: MMAB Waves : East Coast and Gulf of Mexico
item.description: East Coast and Gulf of Mexico significant wave height, wind speed, and peak wave direction, from Western North Atlantic model
item.author: NCEP.EMC.waves@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB waves group)

item.title: MMAB Waves : Pacific Ocean
item.description: Significant wave heights for Pacific Ocean from global wave model
item.author: NCEP.EMC.waves@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB waves group)

item.title: MMAB Waves : Pacific Ocean
item.description: Peak wave period and direction for Pacific Ocean from global wave model
item.author: NCEP.EMC.waves@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB waves group)

item.title: MMAB Waves : North Pacific Ocean
item.description: Significant wave heights for North Pacific Ocean from global wave model
item.author: NCEP.EMC.waves@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB waves group)

item.title: MMAB Waves : North Pacific Ocean
item.description: Peak wave period and direction for North Pacific Ocean from global wave model
item.author: NCEP.EMC.waves@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB waves group)

item.title: MMAB Waves : West Coast US
item.description: Peak wave period and direction for West Coast US from Eastern North Pacific wave model
item.author: NCEP.EMC.waves@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB waves group)

item.title: MMAB Waves : North Atlantic Ocean
item.description: Significant wave heights, wind speed, and peak direction for North Atlantic Ocean from global wave model
item.author: NCEP.EMC.waves@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB waves group)

item.title: MMAB Waves : Indian Ocean
item.description: Significant wave heights, wind speed, and peak direction for Indian Ocean from global wave model
item.author: NCEP.EMC.waves@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB waves group)

item.title: MMAB Sea Ice - high res global
item.description: Sea ice concentration analysis - Global high resolution (5 minutes)
item.author: Robert.Grumbine@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB Seaice group)

item.title: MMAB Sea Ice - high res NH
item.description: Sea ice concentration analysis - Northern Hemisphere high resolution (12.7 km)
item.author: Robert.Grumbine@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB Seaice group)

item.title: MMAB Sea Ice - High resolution Alaskan region
item.description: Sea ice concentration analysis - Alaskan region high resolution (12.7 km)
item.author: Robert.Grumbine@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB Seaice group)

item.title: MMAB Sea Ice - high res SH
item.description: Sea ice concentration analysis - Southern Hemisphere high resolution (12.7 km)
item.author: Robert.Grumbine@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB Seaice group)

item.title: MMAB Sea Ice - Lores
item.description: Sea ice concentration analysis - Global and hemispheric at reduced (30 minute and 25.4 km, respectively) resolution
item.author: Robert.Grumbine@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB Seaice group)

item.title: MMAB Sea Surface Temperature - North Atlantic
item.description: Near real time analysis of sea surface temperature for North Atlantic Ocean
item.author: Robert.Grumbine@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB Marine Meteorology group)

item.title: MMAB Anomaly Sea Surface Temperature - North Atlantic
item.description: Near real time anomaly in sea surface temperature relative to climatology for North Atlantic Ocean
item.author: Robert.Grumbine@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB Marine Meteorology group)

item.title: MMAB Sea Surface Temperature - Northeast Pacific Ocean
item.description: Near real time analysis of sea surface temperature for Northeast Pacific Ocean Ocean
item.author: Robert.Grumbine@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB Marine Meteorology group)

item.title: MMAB Anomaly Sea Surface Temperature - Northeast Pacific Ocean
item.description: Near real time anomaly in sea surface temperature relative to climatology for Northeast Pacific Ocean
item.author: Robert.Grumbine@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB Marine Meteorology group)

item.title: MMAB Sea Surface Temperature - Global
item.description: Near real time analysis of sea surface temperature for the globe
item.author: Robert.Grumbine@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB Marine Meteorology group)

item.title: MMAB Anomaly Sea Surface Temperature - Global
item.description: Near real time anomaly in sea surface temperature relative to climatology for the globe
item.author: Robert.Grumbine@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB Marine Meteorology group)

item.title: MMAB Sea Surface Temperature - North America
item.description: Near real time analysis of sea surface temperature centered on North America
item.author: Robert.Grumbine@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB Marine Meteorology group)

item.title: MMAB Anomaly Sea Surface Temperature - North America
item.description: Near real time anomaly in sea surface temperature relative to climatology for North American region
item.author: Robert.Grumbine@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB Marine Meteorology group)

item.title: MMAB Automated Gulf Stream
item.description: Automated finder for the location of the north wall of the Gulf Stream.
item.author: Robert.Grumbine@noaa.gov (NCEP/EMC/MMAB Coastal oceanography group)
